messages.message: Good morning, engineering folks! Just got a ticket asking if FRB can install a python library into their instance: https://instabase.zendesk.com/agent/tickets/409 I know previously some customers were installing things on our docker images after we handed them over (New Relic agent, I believe?). Is this similar? Or do we want to do it for them? Or…?

Hi David, you are spot on. Ideally, we want FRB to manage this process but it will be a headache to convince them to do it. The worst case is to install it for them in our docker image. @dlluncor can a user import their custom library and then use it in a UDF?
Or any idea who I should be asking?
Started an email thread about the topic
Thanks. Added a quick clarifier in case people weren’t familiar with openpyxl and misinterpreted your “their library” as meaning something FRB wrote in-house.
